attributes.title: SOLAR PLANT – WITH THE CAPACITY OF 52 MW (AC) FEDERATION OF BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA
attributes.author: Armin Babic
attributes.subtitle: Solar plant project – west Herzegovina
attributes.contentA: The project is planned for an output power of 52 MW, and the total installed power will be 62 MW. The project is divided into smaller power plants. The estimated annual production 84,7 GWh.
attributes.contentB: The price is 142.000 EUR per MW (AC), in the ready to build phase.
attributes.contentC: The seller stated that he would intend to sell all project(s).
attributes.contentE: Property-legal relations have been resolved in the entire area – concession has been obtained on the state land, and provided in the land excerpts.The access road property-legal relations have been resolved:
attributes.content1: 1) Basic consent - for the connection to the transmission grid.
attributes.content5: 5)Conditions for connection (the transmission grid is approx. 3 km away).
attributes.conclusion: The seller requests to conclude an NDA (Confidentiality Agreement) with the potential buyer. The aforementioned NDA agreement does not represent any form of legally binding relationship regarding the purchase of the Project.

attributes.title: SOLAR PLANT – WITH THE CAPACITY OF 73 MW (AC) FEDERATION OF BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA
attributes.author: Armin Babic
attributes.subtitle: Solar plant project – west Herzegovina
attributes.contentA: The project is planned for an output power of 73 MW, and the total installed power will be 88 MW. The estimated annual production is 104.3 GWh.
attributes.contentB: The price is 140.000 EUR per MW (AC), in the ready to build phase.
attributes.contentC: The seller stated that he would intend to sell entire project.
attributes.contentE: Property-legal relations have been resolved in the entire area - the concession has been obtained on the state land, and provided in the land excerpts.The access road property-legal relations have been resolved:
attributes.content1: 1) Basic consent - for the connection to the transmission grid.
attributes.conclusion: The seller requests to conclude an NDA (Confidentiality Agreement) with the potential buyer. The aforementioned NDA agreement does not represent any form of legally binding relationship regarding the purchase of the Project.

attributes.title: WIND FARM – WITH THE CAPACITY OF 80 MW (AC) FEDERATION OF BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA
attributes.author: Armin Babic
attributes.subtitle: Wind farm project – middle of Bosnia and Herzegovina
attributes.contentA: The project is planned for an output power of 80 MW and estimated annual production is 290 GWh. The project is developed on the state land.
attributes.contentB: The expected price is 140-150.000 EUR per MW (AC), in the ready to build phase.
attributes.contentC: The seller stated that he would intend to sell all project.
attributes.contentE: Property-legal relations have been resolving – final stage.The access road property-legal relations have been resolved:
attributes.content1: 1) Basic consent - for the connection to the transmission grid.
attributes.content6: 6)The request for energy permit is in the final stage of preparation.

attributes.title: SOLAR PLANT – WITH THE CAPACITY OF 120,5 MW (AC) REPUBLIC OF SRPSKA
attributes.author: Armin Babic
attributes.subtitle: Solar plant project – west of Bosnia and Herzegovina
attributes.contentA: The project is planned for an output power of 120,5 MW, and the total installed power will be 136 MW. The estimated annual production is 202,5 GWh.
attributes.contentB: The price is 110-115.000 EUR per MW (AC), in the ready to build phase.
attributes.contentC: The seller stated that he would intend to sell all project.
attributes.contentE: Property-legal relations have been resolved in the entire area - the concession has been obtained on the state land, and provided in the land excerpts. The access road property-legal relations have been resolved:
attributes.content1: 1) Basic consent - for the connection to the transmission grid.
attributes.content7: 7)The request for construction permit for the preparation works has been filed.
attributes.conclusion: The seller requests to conclude an NDA (Confidentiality Agreement) with the potential buyer. The aforementioned NDA agreement does not represent any form of legally binding relationship regarding the purchase of the Project.

attributes.title: SOLAR PLANT, WITH THE CAPACITY OF 14 MW (AC) FEDERATION OF BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA
attributes.author: Armin Babic
attributes.subtitle: Solar plant project – north-west of Bosnia and Herzegovina
attributes.contentA: The project is planned for an output power of 14 MW and the total installed power will be 18 MW. The project is divided into smaller plants. The estimated annual production 21,28 GWh. The project is developed on the private land plots, which land will be integral part of the transaction. Please note: the owner is well-known developer in the region and has already built and commissioned plenty of solar plant projects.
attributes.contentB: The expected price is 950.000 EUR per MW (AC), in the phase built and commissioned. (the seller is insisting to build the project and to sell it.)
attributes.contentC: The seller stated that he would intend to sell all project(s).
attributes.contentE: Property-legal relations have been resolved in the entire area - the land is private.The access road property-legal relations have been resolved:
attributes.content6: 6)The future step is Construction permit (the main design documentation is preparing).

attributes.title: SOLAR PLANT, WITH THE CAPACITY OF 30 MW (AC) FEDERATION OF BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA
attributes.author: Armin Babic
attributes.subtitle: Solar plant project – middle of Bosnia and Herzegovina
attributes.contentA: The project is planned for an output power of 30,5 MW and the total installed power will be 36,8 MW. The estimated annual production 38,9 GWh. The project is developed on the private land plots, which will be integral part of the purchase price. Please note: the developer is who is well-known developer who has built and commissioned plenty of solar plants.
attributes.contentB: The expected price is 1.050.000 EUR per MW (AC), in the phase built and commissioned. (the seller is insisting to build the project and to sell it.)
attributes.contentC: The seller stated that he would intend to sell all project(s).
attributes.contentE: Property-legal relations have been resolved in the entire area – private land.The access road property-legal relations have been resolved:
attributes.content1: 1)The land is purchased, in the area provided for construction (also, there is still capacity on the transmission grid).
attributes.content2: 2)The Seller is intending the conclude the project purchase agreement. The most important contractual provisions are:
attributes.content3: a) advance payment of 20-30% of the purchase price, with the bank guarantee from the seller, in the mentioned advance payment amount,
attributes.content4: b) deadline for the project development, construction and commissioning is 18-20 months, depending on the agreement with the potential buyer.

attributes.contentA: The project is planned for an output power of 150 MW and estimated annual production is 606 GWh. The project is developed on the state land.
attributes.contentB: The expected price will be discussed.
attributes.contentC: The seller stated that he would intend to sell part of project (e.g. 40-60% or to have joint-venture).
attributes.contentE: Property-legal relations have been resolving – final stage.The access road property-legal relations have been resolved:
attributes.content1: 1)Basic consent - for the connection to the transmission grid.

attributes.title: SOLAR POWER PLANT – CAPACITY OF 140 MW (AC)
attributes.author: Armin Babic
attributes.subtitle: Bosnia and Herzegovina
attributes.contentA: The project(s) are planned for an output capacity of 140 MW AC. The estimated annual production is about 247 GWh. Property-legal relations are resolved across the entire area – a concession has been obtained on land owned by public-legal entities and is listed in the land registry. Property-legal relations for the access road have been resolved.
attributes.contentB: Price is subject to negotiation. (sale in ready-to-build phase)
attributes.contentC: The seller intends to sell the entire project.
attributes.content1: 1)Preliminary consent – for connection to the transmission network
attributes.content7: 7)Construction permit in the process of being obtained
